title: Specials Page Business Flow
description: Describes the user interactions with the Specials page where discounted products are showcased.

steps.user_action: Click on 'Specials' link from the top navigation bar
steps.expected_behavior: Navigates to the Specials page displaying all discounted products

steps.user_action: Scroll through the list of special products
steps.expected_behavior: Discounted products are shown with original and sale prices
Navigates to the product detail page for the selected item

steps.user_action: Sort special products by price or name
steps.expected_behavior: Product list updates according to selected sort option

steps.user_action: Click 'Add to Cart' directly from the specials listing
steps.expected_behavior: Product is added to the cart and confirmation message is shown
